name: VenueDog Events
author: SAI Digital

sections.description:
Pull events from VenueDog.com and put them in the sidebar. Keeps your visits up-to-date on what’s happening.

  • Project Homepage
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin to the ‘wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
When will VenueDog come to my city?

VenueDog events can be added to your city by any user. Once a community is founded in a city, a full-time VeneueDog City Manager can be assigned to better facilitate your local events and venues.
sections.changelog:
1.1.1

Upgraded plugin to use the latest version of the VenueDog.com API Wrapper (https://github.com/saidigital/VenueDogAPI) which improves browser compatibility.

1.1.0

Added administrative control of categories and pagination.

1.0.2

Added default CSS.

1.0.1

Added powered by logo.

1.0.0

Originating version

short_description: A sidebar widget that displays events from VenueDog.com by date. Choose the categories to pull from and the number of days to display at a time.
description:
